wpm.gui

Class Workspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • saf.components.AppWorkspaceComponent
      • wpm.gui.Workspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    saf.components.AppStyleArbiter

    public class Workspace
extends saf.components.AppWorkspaceComponent
    This class serves as the workspace component for this application, providing the user interface controls for editing work.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class saf.components.AppWorkspaceComponent

        workspace, workspaceActivated

      • Fields inherited from interface saf.components.AppStyleArbiter

        CLASS_BORDERED_PANE, CLASS_FILE_BUTTON, CLASS_HEADING_LABEL, CLASS_PROMPT_LABEL, CLASS_PROMPT_TEXT_FIELD, CLASS_SUBHEADING_LABEL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Workspace(saf.AppTemplate initApp)
      Constructor for initializing the workspace, note that this constructor will fully setup the workspace user interface for use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.web.WebEngine getHTMLEngine()
      Accessor method for getting the html engine, which is tied to the page display.
      javafx.scene.control.TreeItem getHTMLRoot()
      Accessor method for getting the root node of the html tree.
      javafx.scene.control.TreeView getHTMLTree()
      Accessor method for getting the html tree, which contains all the tags for the page being edited.
      void initStyle()
      This function specifies the CSS style classes for all the UI components known at the time the workspace is initially constructed.
      void loadTempPage()
      This function loads the temp page into the web view.
      void reloadWorkspace()
      This function reloads all the controls for editing tag attributes into the workspace.
      void setHTMLRoot(javafx.scene.control.TreeItem initRoot)
      Mutator method for setting the root node for the html tree.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Workspace

        public Workspace(saf.AppTemplate initApp)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for initializing the workspace, note that this constructor will fully setup the workspace user interface for use.
        Parameters:
        initApp - The application this workspace is part of.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown should there be an error loading application data for setting up the user interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getHTMLEngine

        public javafx.scene.web.WebEngine getHTMLEngine()
        Accessor method for getting the html engine, which is tied to the page display.
        Returns:
        The html engine for the Web view component.

      • getHTMLTree

        public javafx.scene.control.TreeView getHTMLTree()
        Accessor method for getting the html tree, which contains all the tags for the page being edited.
        Returns:
        The html tree being edited.

      • getHTMLRoot

        public javafx.scene.control.TreeItem getHTMLRoot()
        Accessor method for getting the root node of the html tree. Through that node one can access the full DOM.
        Returns:
        The root node of the html tree currently being edited.

      • setHTMLRoot

        public void setHTMLRoot(javafx.scene.control.TreeItem initRoot)
        Mutator method for setting the root node for the html tree.
        Parameters:
        initRoot - The node to use to set the root.

      • initStyle

        public void initStyle()
        This function specifies the CSS style classes for all the UI components known at the time the workspace is initially constructed. Note that the tag editor controls are added and removed dynamicaly as the application runs so they will have their style setup separately.

      • reloadWorkspace

        public void reloadWorkspace()
        This function reloads all the controls for editing tag attributes into the workspace.
        Specified by:
        reloadWorkspace in class saf.components.AppWorkspaceComponent

      • loadTempPage

        public void loadTempPage()
        This function loads the temp page into the web view.
